articles.author: Heath Parkes-Hupton
articles.title: First cruise ship to arrive in Australia for two years due to COVID-19 pandemic docks in Sydney - ABC News
articles.description: Hordes of people watch from the shore as P&O's Pacific Explorer becomes the first cruise ship to arrive in Australia in two years due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
The first cruise ship to arrive in Australia since the COVID-19 pandemic took hold two years ago has docked in Sydney this morning.
<ul><li>The Pacific Explorer entered Sydney Harbour about 10:30am … [+3930 chars]

articles.author: Tyrone Clarke
articles.title: Albanese suffers major blow following gaffe-laden week - Sky News Australia
articles.description: Scott Morrison has returned as preferred prime minister following a gaffe-laden first week of the election campaign for Labor leader Anthony Albanese.
articles.content: Labor leader Anthony Albanese has suffered a major blow in the polls as his campaign desperately tries to shift back on message following a blunder-filled week.Scott Morrison has returned as preferre… [+2565 chars]

articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.title: Twitter's edit feature may list a tweet's revision history - Yahoo Finance Australia
articles.description: Developer Jane Manchun Wong suggests the tool could create a new tweet whenever someone tweaks something they wrote.
articles.content:
Even since Twitter confirmed

articles.title: Countries renewing efforts for wastewater analysis to detect Covid surge - CanIndia News
articles.description: A slew of countries, including Australia, South Africa, New Zealand, the US and Canada, are increasingly turning towards analysing sewage water, which plays an increasingly critical role in monitoring transmission of Covid virus and its variants within commun…
